segments.text: It seems that he has gone ape over the girl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your parents must be worrying about him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he ’ s been like this for two weeks . We don ’ t know what to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . But he just didn ’ t listen .
segments.speaker: S2
